alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Benson, northwestern Grand Forks, Nelson, northwestern Griggs, southeastern Ramsey, southwestern Walsh and eastern Eddy Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dahlen to 7 miles southwest of Warwick. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakota, McVille, Michigan, Petersburg, Tolna, Crary and Red Willow Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Western Walsh County
